tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE printable_designs (
  design_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  design_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  designer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  upload_date DATE,
  download_count INT DEFAULT 0
)

CREATE TABLE comments(
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    design_id INT REFERENCES designs(design_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE printable_designs (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	design_name VARCHAR(255),
	design_file_path VARCHAR(255),
	designer_name VARCHAR(100),
	description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE print_stats (
	print_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	printer_model VARCHAR(100),
	print_duration INT,
	material_used VARCHAR(100),
	print_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE designs (
    design_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    design_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    designer_name TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    download_count INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE design_tags (
    design_id UUID,
    tag_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (design_id, tag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES designs(design_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(tag_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    design_id UUID,
    commenter_name TEXT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES designs(design_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    design_id UUID,
    rating_value INT CHECK (rating_value >= 1 AND rating_value <= 5),
    rater_name TEXT,
    rating_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (design_id) REFERENCES designs(design_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
